post.body: Thanks for pointing that out, but my idea is different than that. Loopt & Aroundme are also not the same.
I have not found an iPhone dev yet, but we started the site. It just has to be better than the rest.
Not much room to explain here, but a Geo Tagging Social Networking App. Record & Share your favorite places on Earth.
Not much room to explain here but a Geo Tagging Social Networking A
I have a good idea for an iPhone App/Website. Want to hear it?
Cool, do you need my address to send free games to : )
So far the only game I found that I can play with my 2.5 year old is Mario Kart Wii.
Sure, tell me what you need as far as time & format.
My weekend iPhone game pick: Bike or Die 2. Check it out. Have a nice weekend!
Pop in, be an alternate if you wind up solo one week & don't want to skip an episode. anthony@axecreatives.com
Let me know if you ever need a ToG Co-host : )
I hope the dog was wearing a helmet.
Can anyone top this? After a wk of family sickness, I pick my kids up this eve & my 1Yr daughter pukes in the car! BEEP BEEP HELP!
Watchmen Video Journals Podcast on iTunes is a must see. Sadly does not play on my iPhone.
I'm sick, my kids are sick, my wife is at work... Happy Birthday to me : (
My son tricked me out of his nap!
Why do kids poop after you give them a bath?
1 Day Sale on www.apple.com today & I just purchased a Nano for my Bookkeeper 2 days ago : (
Happy Thanksgiving to all!
Listening to Chinese Democracy.
My son got a car bed today. Should I get him a CB Radio so he can talk to other car beds?
